objective.description: Can you translate the words to English?

data.sentence: Is it necessary to tune your guitar
I would like to perform this poem for my mothers funeral
Is it possible to sing at your birthday?
I have to practise a lot to become an expert
The atmosphere in this building is really intimidating
Rotterdam is a really crowded city
This album by the Foo Fighters is terrible
What is your favourite transport? Mine is a BMW Z3
Ajax played really poor today. The lost 1-0
This is a really repetitive sound, i like it?
